name: Listen And Talk
description:
Made Using Godot.

Songs are credited as "Song Name - Artist (Where applicable)"

Kobold Bandit Camp - Firage

Pour Quoi Royale - Zipp

Daily Dozen - Astat

All Day - Girl Talk

Happy Puppycore - Firage

Beethoven's 5 Symphony

Ride of the Valkyries

Reliable Source - Nicolas Falcon

Fonts Used:

Avara

Cave Story

de puntillas [d] to tiptoe Lt

Feltpen

Ravali

Controls:

WASD/ArrowKeys - to move

z/Space Bar - to act

x - to cancel music list

Escape - to bring up quit menu

h - to toggle full screen
